name: Where is My Stuff ? - LITE
description: Dont you ever ask yourself where you have put that thing you just cant find ?  Youd like to better organize your move in order to know exactly what is in your different boxes ?  Youd like to carry out an inventory of your home or apartment to be rented out ?    THIS APP IS FOR YOU    It allows you to carry out the inventory of your things by use of 4 different feature to define your container :  Category: house, relocation,  Container type: box, draw, cupboard,  Place: Kitchen, garage, basement,  Container name: N1, top,  Option :  Password.  Modular feature search.  Your inventories may be sent by html file and by email.  NOW it will be impossible to lose your stuff !   This application is a demo version limited.   Ideal for :  - Relocation - Moving,  - Inventory - Arrangement - Container - House - Garage - Basement - Attic
